summary: Email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York to FBI personnel regarding the scanning of approximately 23 boxes of case records from two FBI case files (72-MM-113327 and 31E-MM-108062) as part of an investigation.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email, identifies as a prosecutor working on the investigation and provides contact information.

persons.name: My colleague
persons.context: Copied on the email, also identified as a prosecutor working on the investigation.

connections.person1: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: Colleagues and co-prosecutors working together on the same investigation.

events.title: Email coordination for case records scanning
events.description: Prosecutors from the Southern District of New York email FBI personnel to coordinate the scanning of approximately 23 boxes of case records from two FBI case files.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email from June 27, 2019, regarding the scanning of case records for an investigation.
Approximately 23 boxes of papers are involved, with about two boxes from FBI case file 72-MM-113327 and the remainder from FBI case file 31E-MM-108062.
The senders are prosecutors from the Southern District of New York working on the investigation.
